author: Digital Foundry
description:
Go to https://expressvpn.com/FOUNDRY and find out how you can get four extra months thanks to our sponsor, ExpressVPN!

Patch 1.03 has arrived from Persona 3 Reload for Switch 2 and it's a big, big improvement overall. A 60fps performance mode has now been added to the docked mode with only small dips from the target. Meanwhile, our key gripe - poor, inconsistent frame-pacing in both docked and handheld modes - has been addressed. The very poor input lag, though? Alas, there's no change there.

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

title: Persona 3 Reload Switch 2's 60FPS Upgrade Tested + Frame Pacing Fixed!
